detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ABank (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ABank.sol#54-125) has payable functions:
	 - ABank.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ABank.sol#119-121)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ABank](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ABank.sol#L54-L125) has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
